snippet: Pittsburgh’s Sidney Crosby will not play in Sunday’s matinee between the Penguins and the Bruins. The team’s next game is Thursday against the Rangers at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby will not make his long-awaited return from concussion and neck injuries in the Penguins nationally televised game against the Boston Bruins, but he may play against the New York Rangers in the following game.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s Sidney Crosby will not play in Sunday’s matinee between the Penguins and the Bruins. The team’s next game is Thursday against the Rangers at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Sidney Crosby Might Play Against the Rangers
headline.main: Crosby May Play Against the Rangers
headline.print_headline: Crosby May Play Against the Rangers
